entry.title: [SQ] Starting PhD program in neurosci in 1 week. General advice is wanted, but I have
entry.content: Starting PhD program in neurosci in 1 week. General advice is wanted, but I have one specific question: how do I build a close knit group of friends? I am a little scared bc i am 21 and 2 years younger than anyone in my cohort of 20 ppl. I still like to hang out with my undergrad friends (moving away 400 miles) and do undergrad things (getting very very wasted etc).
